sources.title: Panic In The Streets 1950
sources.description: A Silent, Savage Menace:  Reassessing "Panic in the Streets" Elia Kazan’s 1950 film noir finds new relevance in a  moment gripped  by pandemic and social unrest.* Directed by Elia Kazan. It was shot exclusively on location in New Orleans, Louisiana, and features numerous New Orleans citizens in speaking and non-speaking roles. * https://www.sciencehistory.org/distillations/a-silent-savage-menace-reassessing-panic-in-the-streets
